summary: This is a brief email correspondence regarding inmate Jeffrey Epstein's condition in custody, noting he feels dehydrated due to long legal visits. It appears to be internal communication about his status.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The inmate referenced by number #76318-054, reported to be feeling dehydrated due to long legal visits.

events.title: Epstein reports dehydration in custody
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein states he is feeling dehydrated because he is not drinking enough water since he has legal visits 12 hours a day.

keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein was in custody as inmate #76318-054 as of July 27, 2019.
Epstein reported feeling dehydrated, attributing it to not drinking enough water due to having legal visits 12 hours a day.
The document indicates Epstein was actively engaged in legal proceedings while incarcerated.
